casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Donnell ALEXANDER. No. 622A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2005. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of March 2005 by Defendant for a thirty (30) day extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (James Alexander) shall have up to and Including the 11th day of April 2005, which is a twenty-one (21) day extension to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2005."
